thread.title: Win £100 RSPCA voucher and meet adorable animals
thread.title_full: Win £100 RSPCA voucher and meet adorable animals - Telegraph

author: The Telegraph
title: Win £100 RSPCA voucher and meet adorable animals
text: To celebrate all the good work the charity does, the RSPCA is offering a VIP guided tour for two at the winner's local animal, wildlife or hospital centre. Go behind the scenes at a time that suits you and learn all there is to know about animal care and welfare. You'll meet some of the inspiring staff who are committed to making a difference to animals' lives. And the best bit? You'll get to meet some cuddly characters along the way! As part of the prize, you'll also get £100 to spend at the RSPCA online shop . From bird boxes and pet accessories to clothing and homeware decorations, there's lots of gifts to choose from. And that's not all, 10 runners up will also receive a £25 gift voucher to spend online at the RSPCA shop. To be in with a chance of winning this fabulous prize, complete and submit the form below by midnight on Sunday 27 December 2015. Online Form - Win £100 RSPCA voucher and meet adorable animals
